column4: help: why cant i install software whilst using synaptic manager
you use synaptic to install software
are you trying to use something like apt-get at the same time as synaptic?
what exactly are you doing when you get the error?
installing packages
okay, how are you installing packages?
using synaptic package manager
okay
and you're only using synaptic?
can I be doing that and using Add/remove to install software
no
you can only use one package manager at a time
That's slow
there is a database that keeps track of which packages that are installed
you can tell the package manager to install more than one package at a time
Is there a site I can download a whole collection of packages and install?
probably
It looks like using the package manager after fresh installation is really slow
maybe your net connection is slow
It makes the ladder to high to climb
I am in Ghana
hmm
perhaps you can change your package manager to use a mirror closer to you
